text: Niscaya nai ‘‘karuna’’ musako kaumamadhyeko thiyo, tara usale unako virud'dha atyacara garna thaleko thiyo. Ra hamile usala'i yati khajana di'eka thiyaum ki tyasako samcoharu aneka valasaliharuka lagi pani ucalna gahro thiyo. Ekacoti jaba usasita usako samuhaka manisale bhane ki unmata naho'u kinabhane allahale unmadiharula'i ruca'umdainan
